Container.Description: Muse is a highly-opinionated midwestern self-hosted Discord music bot that doesn't suck. It's made for small to medium-sized Discord servers/guilds (think about a group the size of you, your friends, and your friend's friends).[br] [b]Features:[/b][br] 🎥 Livestreams[br] ⏩ Seeking within a song/video[br] 💾 Local caching for better performance[br] 📋 No vote-to-skip - this is anarchy, not a democracy[br] ↔️ Autoconverts playlists / artists / albums / songs from Spotify[br] ↗️ Users can add custom shortcuts (aliases)[br] 1️⃣ Muse instance supports multiple guilds[br] ✍️ Written in TypeScript, easily extendable[br] ❤️ Loyal Packers fan
